15614.title: Cropsey
15614.description: Two documentary filmmakers are haunted by a real-life urban legend of the boogeyman, who may be responsible for the disappearances of five children.

15656.title: Tapped
15656.description: The high cost -- to both the environment and our health -- of bottled water is the subject of this documentary that enlists activists, environmentalists, community leaders and others to expose the dark side of the bottled water industry.

30829.title: Arranged
30829.description: Official Selection - SXSW Film Festival. An Orthodox Jew and a Muslim form a strong bond while getting arranged marriages."

56919.title: Which Way Home
56919.description: This Academy Award nominated film shows the personal side of immigration through the eyes of children who face harrowing dangers with enormous courage and resourcefulness as they endeavor to make it form Mexico to the United States.

289827.title: Mad Money
289827.description: Noticing a flaw in security, three women employed by the Federal Reserve band together to smuggle out millions in bills slated for destruction.

307749.title: Blue Steel
307749.description: A rookie New York cop must deal with more than she bargained for, including a misconduct charge and a psychopath who's become obsessed with her.

310493.title: Air Guitar Nation
310493.description: The guitars may be fake, but the competition is real as legions of aspiring mock stars head to the U.S. Air Guitar Championships in this colorful doc.

310498.title: Hot Coffee
310498.description: We explore how the infamous McDonald's hot coffee lawsuit sparked a big business propaganda and tort reform campaign, weakening civil justice.

312543.title: Marjoe
312543.description: This Oscar-winning documentary chronicles the story of a firebrand evangelical preacher who wholeheartedly and humorously exposes himself as a fraud.

314069.title: The Rape of Europa
314069.description: In a journey through seven countries, this film explores the violent whirlwind of Nazism that threatened to wipe out the artistic heritage of Europe.

318032.title: The Decline of Western Civilization
318032.description: Penelope Spheeris' The Decline Of Western Civilization is a riveting, unflinching and hard-core film which adeptly captures the spirit of a major cultural phenomenon. Including performances by X, Circle Jerks, Black Flag, Catholic Discipline, Germs and Alice Bag Band. Breaking down barriers of expression and social mores, the Decline punks were against everything: They gave birth to an anti-establishment view of the world that permeates today's music, politics, social attitudes, styles and trends. The film documents their deliberate reaction to the mass commercialism of music; it is a blatant and angry rejection of the mainstream. Burgeoning at the time, many of the punk bands first seen here have become legendary. The effect of the film on current day music, styles and trends is immeasurable.

318033.title: The Decline of Western Civilization Part II: The Metal Years
318033.description: A fast-paced look at the heavy metal scene in late-1980s Los Angeles with fascinating portraits of struggling musicians, fans and starstruck groupies.

318034.title: The Decline of Western Civilization Part III
318034.description: The Decline of Western Civilization III is a 1998 documentary film that follows the gutter punk lifestyle of homeless teenagers.

321248.title: The Source Family
321248.description: A commune of people takes up residence in a Hollywood mansion before fleeing to Hawaii.

329436.title: Skipped Parts
329436.description: With the help of a fantasy girl, a classmate and his rebellious mom, a 14-year-old aspiring author gets a thorough lesson in his favorite topic: sex.

368729.title: Black Widows
368729.description: A dark comedy about three childhood friends who decide to enact seemingly harmless revenge on one's rapist only for things to spiral cataclysmically out of control.

376132.title: Deliver Us From Evil
376132.description: This chilling documentary profiles an Irish priest who raped and molested dozens of children over twenty years, all covered up by the Catholic Church.

376157.title: The Truth About Jane
376157.description: Jane and Janice’s loving mother-daughter relationship is put the ultimate test when Jane realizes she’s a lesbian and her mother can’t accept it.

399199.title: The Red Pill
399199.description: When a feminist filmmaker sets out to document the polarizing world of the Men's Rights Movement, she begins to question her own beliefs.

405676.title: Go Fish
405676.description: A romantic tale about finding a soulmate. The only difference here is that both partners are women...in Chicago's lesbian community.

441468.title: Boynton Beach Club
441468.description: A romantic comedy about our amazing capacity to rebound and fall in love at any age. Lois, Harry, Marilyn ,Sandy and Jack live in an "Active Adult" community in Boynton Beach, Florida. Their lives intersect when they meet at a local Bereavement Club where they go to find emotional support after the loss of a loved one. For anyone who thinks that new love and romance ends long before retirement, they're in for a reality check. No one sees themselves as becoming old, and the residents of Boynton Beach aren't about to start. But sometimes we all need a little reminder that life is worth living and sharing.

447913.title: But I'm a Cheerleader
447913.description: A naive cheerleader is sent to a gay conversion camp when her strait-laced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian in this quirky comedy.

451379.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
451379.description: Ruby (Jamie Chung) and Josh (Bryan Greenberg) spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance. As effervescent as a perfect first date, this charming walk and talk romance takes full advantage of the magical landscape that is Hong Kong at night.

451916.title: Wish You Well
451916.description: A tragic accident forces 12-year old Louisa Mae and her younger brother to move from New York City to their great grandmother's farm in Virginia.

456288.title: Cold Souls
456288.description: Bogged down by his preparation for a Chekhov play, an anxious actor has his soul temporarily removed by a doctor, who then loses it.

458075.title: Autumn in New York
458075.description: When a middle-aged playboy and successful restauranteur meets his match in a woman half his age, a rare, precious, and fragile romance blooms.

461301.title: The Sisterhood of the Night
461301.description: A quiet small town succumbs to a wave of hysteria and a modern-day witch trial when a teen claims she was victimized by a secret society of her peers.

464397.title: Meadowland
464397.description: In the hazy aftermath of an unimaginable loss, Sarah and Phil become increasingly unhinged and recklessly ignore the repercussions of their behavior.

466389.title: Snapshots
466389.description: Three generations of women collide at a family’s summer house, when a roll of film from 1960 is found, and the legacy that developed comes into focus.

466970.title: The Ron Clark Story
466970.description: The true story of an innovative, white, southern man chronicles his challenge as a new teacher in the neediest class of a tough Harlem public school.

469266.title: The Velvet Vampire
469266.description: Newlyweds’ excitement at being invited for some chill time at their sexy neighbor’s posh home turns to horror when they find she’s a thirsty vampire.

469605.title: Shadrach
469605.description: In 1935, a 99-year old man asks new landowners to be buried where he was born into slavery, but a black man’s burial on their land violates state law.

472187.title: Fed Up
472187.description: A documentary that looks at our common perceptions of food and exercise, knowledge that the food industry and the government know is misleading.

473036.title: Bruno
473036.description: A quirky child genius struggles with bullying and family troubles, until his grandmother teaches him how to stand up and fight for his individuality.

473956.title: Suburbia
473956.description: Two brothers in Los Angeles escape their alcoholic mother by moving in with a band of punk-rock squatters who form a surrogate family.

475316.title: The Texture of Falling
475316.description: Passions and fantasies hit the wall in this psychological thriller about four strangers who meet up to explore their yearnings with no boundaries

475840.title: Stephanie Daley
475840.description: When a child is tried for murdering a newborn, a pregnant psychologist, who once lost a baby, searches for the truth and redemption for them both.

477716.title: I'm Not Here
477716.description: A traumatic event in a young man’s life haunts him completely. As he heals, he realizes that his father has suffered greatly in his own life as well.

480231.title: Guncrazy
480231.description: When a class assignment calls for students to locate pen-pals, Anita begins corresponding with a soon-to-be-released inmate in a central California prison. Frequently raped by her mother's boyfriend, she harbors deep tendencies for violence and aggression. As their exchanges grow from platonic to passionate, Anita develops newfound confidence and decides to act on that aggression against her attacker, Rooney. Upon release from prison, Howard and Anita meet. She reveals Rooney's murder to him, and the two hide his body. From there the death toll only rises, and the couple is forced to go on the run. But with the authorities in pursuit, can the young lovers avoid meeting their fate?

486618.title: Lifted
486618.description: An Alabama middle school student prepares for a singing competition while dealing with heavy family problems, and relentless school bullies.

486649.title: Dudes
486649.description: Two big-city punks travel cross-country and embrace the western ethos when they take revenge against a group of rednecks for killing their friend.

496080.title: Fair Haven
496080.description: A young man returns home after receiving gay conversion therapy, and is torn between family expectations and memories of a love he has tried to bury.

497268.title: Banshee Chapter
497268.description: A journalist explores the disturbing links behind her friend’s sudden disappearance, an ominous government research chemical, and a radio broadcast.

499678.title: The Trials of Darryl Hunt
499678.description: Darryl Hunt spent nearly twenty years in prison for a brutal rape/murder that he didn't commit. This doc examines social justice through two decades.

504563.title: Jim Gaffigan: Noble Ape
504563.description: The stand-up comedy star describes how his wife faced a medical crisis, and he attempted to hold down the fort for their five children.

506534.title: Thinspiration
506534.description: A young woman suffering from an eating disorder develops a new compulsion when she begins stalking the founder of website promoting thinness.

508636.title: The Road Within
508636.description: A man with Tourette's syndrome brings his OCD roommate and an anorexic woman along on a road trip to take his late mother's ashes to the ocean.

512246.title: After Tiller
512246.description: After Tiller intimately explores the highly controversial subject of third-trimester abortions in the wake of the 2009 assassination of practitioner Dr. George Tiller. The procedure is now performed by only four doctors in the United States, all former colleagues of Dr. Tiller, who risk their lives every day in the name of their unwavering commitment toward their patients. Directors Martha Shane and Lana Wilson have created a moving and unique exploration of one of the most incendiary topics of our time, and they've done so in an informative, thought-provoking, and compassionate way.

512427.title: The Parking Lot Movie
512427.description: An eccentric fraternity of artistic and overeducated parking attendants starts to resent and wages war against the elitists who park in their lot.

513412.title: In Montauk
513412.description: A conflicted artist, with all the trappings of a great life, ends up making impossibly personal choices after opening her home to a musical genius.

513794.title: Wendy and Lucy
513794.description: For Wendy, the drive to Ketchikan, Alaska, was meant to be the start of a new life. But when her car breaks down in Oregon, everything unravels.

514175.title: Blood Tea and Red String
514175.description: A stop-motion animated fairy tale for adults about two factions, the White Mice and the Creatures Who Dwell Under the Oak, fighting for a prized doll.

517758.title: Swim Little Fish Swim
517758.description: A quirky, married musician living in a small New York City apartment meets a French video maker and they inspire each other’s artistic dreams.

518275.title: Beneath the Harvest Sky
518275.description: Desperate to escape their small Maine town, loyal teenage friends find their bond tested, when one is pulled into drug-smuggling by his outlaw father.

519328.title: Bridegroom
519328.description: In 2011, a young man named Tom died in a tragic accident. Because of legalities, his partner Shane lost all claims to him. This is their story.

519358.title: Matt Shepard Is a Friend of Mine
519358.description: Friends, family members and loved ones of Matthew Shepard discuss the positive impact of his life, as well as the aftermath of his tragic murder.

527835.title: Akron
527835.description: A tragic event from the past tests the relationship between two college freshmen and threatens to divide their families.

527869.title: No Impact Man
527869.description: An environmentalist and his family attempt to make as little environmental impact as possible for one year.

535978.title: Cristiano Ronaldo El Mundo a sus pies (Doblado)
535978.description: Una semblanza íntima de un as del balompié europeo que no solo sobresale en su deporte, sino también en sus línea de moda.

539658.title: Albion: The Enchanted Stallion
539658.description: A 12-year-old girl is transported by a magical black stallion to a mystical world where she alone is the key to saving an entire race of people.

540301.title: She's Beautiful When She's Angry
540301.description: A provocative, witty and historical account of the start of the women’s liberation movement, from the 1960s through the 21st century.

540532.title: Meru
540532.description: Visually stunning and emotionally powerful chronicle of the obsessive drive of 3 climbers set to take on the dangerous Mount Meru in the Himalayas.

541289.title: Making Waves
541289.description: The world’s most renowned directors discuss the role sound design has played in cultivating the emotional center of our favorite films.

543737.title: 30 Miles From Nowhere
543737.description: When five college pals return to rural Wisconsin for their estranged friend's funeral, what begins as an uneasy reunion becomes a terrifying fight for survival.

549596.title: Loving Annabelle
549596.description: A rebellious young woman falls for her teacher, But her uptight Catholic girls’ boarding school makes for a tough environment for a budding romance.

552446.title: Miss Stevens
552446.description: A restless, lonely school teacher begins to find her true self while escorting some of her most emotional students on an eye-opening class trip.

552447.title: Operator
552447.description: In order to make a computer service seem more human, a man uses his wife's voice talents to add warmth, but he becomes enamored by his creation.

553150.title: Nancy
553150.description: A woman with a loose grip on reality, begins to insist she was abducted as a child when she meets a couple whose daughter went missing 30 years ago.

554488.title: My Blind Brother
554488.description: Constantly overshadowed by his inspirational brother, a slacker must compete for the love of the same woman in the ultimate challenge.

560165.title: A Dry White Season
560165.description: A teacher’s indifference to the cruelty of apartheid in 1970s South Africa changes drastically when a cold-blooded murder compels him to seek justice.

567731.title: The Deeper You Dig
567731.description: When the lives of a psychic, a teenager, and a secretive recluse collide, a girl who is senselessly murdered proves that love will not stay buried.

588766.title: Braid
588766.description: Desperate for money, two criminals visit their wealthy childhood friend who they believe they can rob, that is if they can survive her bizarre games.

600349.title: AWOL
600349.description: Joey joins the Army as a way out of Pennsylvania coal country just as she falls in love with magnetic housewife Rayna. A splendid meditation on the boundless possibilities of first love constricted by the trials of poverty.

600358.title: Violencia Sangrienta (Doblado)
600358.description: Un joven es atraído hacia un triángulo de amor peligroso que comienza a tomar una serie de giros sobrenaturales, impactantes y espantosos.

604303.title: Daughters of the Dust
604303.description: At the dawn of the 20th century, a multi-generational family in the Gullah community on the Sea Islands off of South Carolina struggle to maintain their cultural heritage and folklore while contemplating a migration to the mainland.

610685.title: Kill Me Later
610685.description: A banker with a tough past becomes suicidal after she finds her married lover is starting a family without her, only to be taken hostage at gunpoint.

611962.title: Coyote Lake
611962.description: In a Texas ghost town near Mexico’s border, a mother and daughter running a B&B are attacked by two drug runners who should be very afraid of them.

613315.title: The Tiger Hunter
613315.description: An Indian man who came to the U.S. to work in tech and honor his tiger hunter father sees his plans fall apart as he tries to impress his first love.

618304.title: The Deadliest Lie
618304.description: A woman whose career has stalled warms up to an uninhibited female mentor, but when things soon mysteriously go wrong, she suspects her new friend.

623244.title: Punk's Not Dead
623244.description: Features interviews, performances, and behind-the-scenes footage with the bands, labels, fans, and press at the heart of punk music and culture.

628024.title: Sophie and the Rising Sun
628024.description: In 1941 South Carolina, an Asian stranger and native Southerner begin a forbidden, interracial  romance and are swept up in the tides of history.

629447.title: The American Side
629447.description: A low-level detective finds a conspiracy to erect a stunning invention by Nikola Tesla after his partner dies and a suicide occurs at Niagara Falls.

634721.title: Most Wanted Santa
634721.description: When a number of valuable art pieces go missing, it’s up to an FBI agent and a detective to track down their top suspect, a handsome Santa Claus.

638154.title: Girls Getaway Gone Wrong
638154.description: A weekend trip at a luxury resort for three friends turns into a murder mystery with the investigation narrowing in on them as suspects.

652649.title: Romeo & Juliet Killers
652649.description: A teen and her boyfriend murder her single mother, then run away and attempt suicide.

674931.title: Tow
674931.description: Twin sisters must confront their past when their attempted killer re-enters their lives.

691964.title: Mistletoe Time Machine
691964.description: After drinking a mysterious holiday cocktail, a group of estranged friends are sent back in time to their high school days to right their wrongs and live the lives that they never had.

692140.title: Hot Take: The Depp/Heard Trial
692140.description: Follows the tumultuous relationship—in and out of court—of Johnny Depp and his ex-wife, Amber Heard.

694192.title: A Party to Die For
694192.description: After a party turns deadly, an aspiring socialite and her friend must find a way to get rid of a body and avoid the consequences of their actions.

698742.title: Bed Rest
698742.description: After struggling to start a family, Julie Rivers is pregnant again. Put on mandatory bed rest, Julie starts unraveling as ghostly experiences in the home begin closing in on her.

704365.title: Suburban Nightmare: JonBenet Ramsey
704365.description: More than 25 years after her murder, mystery still surrounds the case of JonBenet Ramsey, the young pageant princess who was killed inside her family’s home on Dec 26th, 1996.

705436.title: Prisoner of Love
705436.description: Inspired by a true story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps plot his escape, leaving her hometown to question her choices.

708829.title: The Stepmother 2
708829.description: Elizabeth breaks free from the hospital with a new mission - find a new family and live happily ever after, she can’t escape her past and will fight.

713116.title: A Neighbor's Vendetta
713116.description: After an affair leads to an accidental death, a married couple moves away to start all over only to find trouble next door.

713221.title: Safe Word
713221.description: When a newlywed couple decides to open their relationship to strangers, the wife quickly realizes her husband is a sadistic monster whose fetishes might destroy her.

722270.title: Deadly Estate
722270.description: When a hotel manager is wrongly accused of killing the soon-to-be new owner’s son, she must use her hospitality skills to prove her innocence.

100000301.title: Castaways
100000301.description: In a post apocalyptic world, two women find themselves shipwrecked on a deserted island. As they fight to survive, the experience bonds them in ways they could never have imagined.

100000334.title: Queen of Cocaine
100000334.description: In a crime world built formen, only onewomanwas daring enough to pave the way for the most infamous Colombian cartels: Griselda Blanco, the Godmother of Cocaine.

100000379.title: Classmates
100000379.description: A computer mixup gives two college freshman the chance to swap places but things take a turn when the switch puts them both in danger.

100000719.title: Surprise
100000719.description: Convinced his wife is cheating on him with his best friend, a husband goes off the deep end into a conspiracy, only to find himself unprepared for what comes next.

100000747.title: Dead Hot
100000747.description: After a ghost hunt gone wrong, students of witchcraft Vanessa Hudgens and GG Magree travel to Salem, Massachusetts to seek out proper mentorship from experts in witchcraft.

100000963.title: Blood, Sweat and Cheer
100000963.description: A mother seeking to relive her glory days poses as her teen daughter to join a high school dance team.

100001250.title: Marry F*** Kill
100001250.description: After their friend Beth’s suicide, five estranged friends learn Beth bequeathed them her ancestral home - but unbeknownst to them, they’ve inherited something far more sinister.

100003305.title: VICE News Presents: Vigilante, Inc.
100003305.description: As a fire engulfs LA, the online world of the Citizen App spills into the real one, and so too do the terrifying consequences of these calls to action – a vigilante man-hunt.

0300009670.title: HouseBroken
0300009670.description: "HouseBroken" is an irreverent animated series following a group of neighborhood animals who help each other navigate the complicated life of being a pet.
